description: External economic shocks affecting bank viability
examples: Crop losses, local economic depression, deflation, regional recessions
Bad loans writing off to loss; securities depreciation; failed investments
Embezzlement, falsified records, insider theft, defalcation by officers
Incompetent management, poor oversight by directors, weak internal controls

description: Violation of lending limits and concentration
examples: Loans exceeding legal limits, excessive concentration in single borrower/industry
Bank runs, inability to meet withdrawal demands, liquidity shortfall
